games_info.coguard_desc: Test your intuition. Guess if the next random number will be higher or lower than the current one. The longer the streak of correct answers, the higher your multiplier.
games_info.staring_desc:
Play against others with SCP-173. Don't blink to survive and take the pot. With each round, the probability of death increases, and in the last round, everyone dies.
Modes:
* Normal â€“ the game ends after the first death, survivors split the pot.
* Last Man Standing â€“ the game continues until one winner remains.
games_info.hole_desc:
Anomalous roulette. Place a bet on the item you think the hole will return.
Options:
* Item bet (x36) â€“ bet on a specific item.
* Group bets (x2, x3) â€“ bet on a specific group of items, as shown in the image.
